payments.comment: Amadu has just made a payment to HELP Africa.  She very much appreciates the support she is receiving from Kiva lenders, and says thank you to each of the people that has helped her to come one step closer to realizing her dreams.

Thak you . Your support was needed to make this big change on this woman's life 
Thank yoou

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase generic drugs

payments.comment:
Thak you . Your support was needed to make this big change on this woman's life 
Thank yoou

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more charcoal for her current business.

payments.comment:
Thak you . Your support was needed to make this big change on this woman's life 
Thank yoou

loans.name: Cecile

texts.en:
Mrs. L. is married with five children. She has sold vegetables for eight years. She wants to expand her stand inventory by carrying a larger quantity and variety of vegetables such as lettuce, carrots, cucumbers, potatoes, etc. Since she has started selling vegetables, she has become capable of providing the basic needs for her family, particularly food, and now does not need to wait for her husband to pay for all the financial needs of the family.

Mrs. L. is a member of the group “DIEU EST BON” in which three people want to receive a loan of $125 each. The total loan solicited by the group is $375.

loans.use: To expand the inventory of her vegetable stand.

payments.comment: Latevi has just made a payment to HELP Africa.  She would like to thank her lenders for helping support her, and for believing in her work.

Thak you . Your support was needed to make this big change on this woman's life 
Thank yoou

loans.name: Francys

texts.es:
Francys D. is single, he is 24 years old, and lives with his parents in the center of the city of Caaguazú. Francys started working when he was very young. First he worked in car repair shop, and later he worked in a car parts store, where he learned a lot about electronics, installation, and car accessories.

After several years of learning and saving money, Francys was able to open his own business in his house. He sells and installs car accessories, such as radios, buffers, speakers, power windows, etc.

He has a good number of clients, due to the fact that there are not many businesses in that part of town that sell the same types of products. Francys wants to expand his business and vary his merchandise with the latest models on the market. To do this he is requesting a loan of $200.00, with which he plans to buy new models of car radios.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer.

Francys D. es soltero, tiene 24 años, se encuentra viviendo en la casa de sus padres, ubicado en el Centro de la ciudad de Caaguazú. Francys trabaja desde muy joven, empezó como ayudante en un taller, luego trabajo en una casa de equipamientos para vehículos, donde aprendió mucho de electrónica, montaje y equipamientos de accesorios para vehículos. Tras varios años de aprendizaje y ahorro, Francys logró independizarse y abrir su propio negocio en su casa, donde se dedica a la venta e instalación de equipamientos para vehículos, como radios, buffers, parlantes, levanta vidrios eléctricos, etc. Posee buena cantidad de clientes, debido a que en la zona no hay muchos negocios que se dediquen a la venta de este tipo de insumos. Francys quiere seguir ampliando su negocio y variar sus mercaderías con los últimos modelos del mercado, por lo que solicita un crédito de $ 200 con los que planea comprar modelos nuevos de radios para vehículos.

loans.use: To buy car radios at whole-sale price

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
Mrs. Elena Sardón lives in her own home in the district of Pasankeri Iadera, in the western part of the city La Paz. Mrs. Sardón is a farmer in a rural area that surrounds La Paz, where she cultivates mostly vegetables and potatoes which she harvests and sells on wholesales in the town markets. Her property is currently in a precarious situation because during the rainy season, she lost some of her crop when the river near where her land overflowed. She and other members of the community have worked to create flood defenses to help protect her property. The loan she is applying for will be used to help create flood barriers for her rural property. This is the fourth loan that she is applying for and her history with Impro proves her to be a reliable client and able to take on another loan.

Translated from Spanish by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

La señora Elena Sardón vive en casa propia en la zona de Pasankeri ladera oeste de la Ciudad de la Paz, la señora Sardón es agricultora en el área rural aledaña a la ciudad de La Paz cultivando principalmente legumbres, papa y verduras que luego de la cosecha vende al por mayor en los mercados de la ciudad. La propiedad a su cargo actualmente corre riesgo, ya que en épocas de lluvia y por su proximidad a un río, el desborde del mismo ya ocasionó perdidas en sus cosechas, por tal motivo la señora Sardón y los comunarios de esa zona realizaran trabajos con defensivos y gaviones que aseguraran su propiedad. El crédito solicitado ira al trabajo de prevención de riadas en su propiedad de la zona rural. Esta es el cuarto crédito y los antecedentes históricos con Impro la Califican como cliente preferencial y puede acceder un nuevo crédito.

loans.use: Construction

loans.name: Leoncio

texts.es:
Leonico lives with his parents in a home near the district of Pasankeri, on the western side of the city La Paz. Like many Bolivians, he is self-employed, assembling computers that are sold to business offices in the city. With the savings he had, he was able to purchase a piece of land in the Pasankeri district. He found this site without a single previous construction on it, with only a wall for property definition surrounding it. The loan he is applying for will be used for the construction of a brick-home, which will allow him to live on his own and to begin the construction of his own home. His previous history with Impro shows him to be a reliable client and able to take on a new loan.

Translated from Spanish by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor

Leoncio vive con sus padres en la vivienda de éstos ubicada en la zona de Pasankeri, ladera oeste de la Ciudad de la Paz. Como muchos bolivianos trabaja de forma independiente armando computadoras que comercializa en distintas oficinas de nuestra ciudad. Con los ahorros que tenía ha logrado comprar un terreno en la misma zona de Pasankeri. El mismo que se encuentra sin construcción alguna y tan solo tiene un muro perimetral de resguardo de propiedad. El crédito que solicita es para la construcción de una habitación de ladrillo que le permita poder vivir de forma independiente e iniciar la construcción de su vivienda propia. Su antecedente histórico con Impro, la califica como cliente preferencial y puede acceder un nuevo crédito.

loans.use: Construction

loans.name: Hernando

texts.es:
Hernando is 30 years old, married, and father of 2 children. One is 10 years old and the other is 7. Both go to a private primary school in town. His wife helps generating income to pay for the family expenses; she runs a convenience store from home.

Hernando is a carpenter, he makes furniture on order for companies as well as for furniture stores in the city. He started this profession as a helper for his father, who also was a carpenter, and he learned his woodworking skills from him. He does excellent work and creates well-finished products.

Because of the high quality of his work, he is well-known in the city, and he was able to get two new customers: two schools who ordered tables and chairs for the classrooms. In order to be able to fulfill these orders, he needs a loan of $775 to buy wood, which will help him to start the job.

Translated by Ramón F. Kolb, Kiva Volunteer

Original loan description in Spanish:

Hernando tiene 30 años, está casado y es padre de dos niños, uno de 10 años y otro de ,7 ambos están cursando la etapa primaria en una escuela de privada de la ciudad. Su esposa lo ayuda con los ingresos y los gastos familiares, ella tiene una despensa que atiende en su casa.

Hernando se dedica a la carpintería, el fabrica muebles bajo pedido para empresas y otros los elabora para proveer a las mueblerías de la ciudad; él empezó en el rubro como ayudante de su padre que también fue carpintero y heredo sus habilidades con la madera, pues sus trabajos son muy buenos y de excelente terminación.

Como la calidad de sus productos es muy bueno y reconocido en la ciudad, el ha conseguido dos clientes nuevos más, son dos colegios que solicitaron mesas y sillas para aulas, para poder cumplir con su demanda necesita un crédito de $ 775 para poder comprar madera que lo ayudara a empezar su trabajo.

loans.use: To buy wholesale wood

loans.name: Luz Bella

texts.en:
Luz Bella is 27 years old, married, and 4 months pregnant. She lives with her parents in a neighborhood of the city of Caaguazú. She sells milk.

Her work days start at 4 AM, when she gets up to milk her cows. Starting at 6 AM, she goes out to sell milk to the homes and stores in the neighborhood and town. She distributes her milk using her bicycle, driving around all morning long. She owns 7 milk cows, and they produce around 40-50 liters of milk per day. The demand for her product is growing every day more.

Luz wants to buy a motorcycle that will allow her to get around easier, as with the passage of time, her belly will grow and it will be more difficult to distribute her product by bicycle. She is requesting a loan of $300 that she will use to buy the motorcycle.

Translated by Ramón F. Kolb, Kiva Volunteer

Original loan description in Spanish:

Luz Bella, tiene 27 años, está casada y tiene 4 meses de embarazo, vive con sus padres en un pueblo de la ciudad de Caaguazú. Ella se dedica a la venta de leche de vaca.

Sus días laborales empiezan a las 4 de la mañana, cuando se levanta a ordeñar sus vacas, y a partir de las 6 sale a vender su leche a todas las casas y despensas de la zona y la cuidad. Ella reparte su leche montada en su bicicleta, y recorre toda la mañana. Posee 7 vacas lecheras, que producen aproximadamente entre 40 y 50 litros de leche por día, y la demanda de su producto aumenta cada día.

Luz desea comprarse una moto que le permitirá desplazarse mejor, ya que a medida que avance el tiempo y crezca su panza se le hará más difícil repartir su producto en la bicicleta. Ella solicita un crédito de $ 300 que lo utilizará para comprarse la moto.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Eulalio

texts.en:
Eulalio is 41 years old, married, and has 2 sons: one of 16 years old and the other is 3. He is a native of Guyraungua, a small village near Caaguazú, where he and his family currently live. His wife runs a restaurant in their home, and this way she also contributes to the household income.

Eulalio is very hardworking. He is a pipe fitter who makes the connections to the drinking water supply. He started out with only 5 users, but today there are more than 160 clients who enjoy his service.

Because the villages are growing and modernizing, the amount of clients grows every day more. In order to meet demand, he needs to buy more supplies and materials for connections; he needs a loan of $200 that he will use to buy shut-off valves, piping, and a special tool that will help him to speed up the placement of the pipes.

Translated by Ramón F. Kolb, Kiva Volunteer

Original loan description in Spanish:

Eulalio es un señor de 41 años, está casado y tiene 2 hijos, dos varones, uno de 16 años y otro de 3, él es oriundo de Guyraungua, un pueblo pequeños de Caaguazú, donde actualmente se encuentra radicado con su familia. Su esposa es dueña de un comedor ubicado en la misma casa, con ello aporta también con los gastos familiares. Eulalio es un señor muy trabajador, el se dedica a la conexión de agua potable, empezó con tan solo 5 usuarios, hoy día son más de 160 usuarios que gozan de su servicio. Debido a que los pueblos van agrandándose y modernizándose, la cantidad de usuarios aumenta cada día más, por lo que para poder abastecer su demanda necesita comprar más insumos y materiales para las conexiones; necesita un crédito de $ 200 que lo utilizará para la compra de caños, tubos, y una herramienta especial que lo ayudará a agilizar la colocación de las conexiones.

loans.use: To buy valves, pipes, and a special tool to join water pipes

loans.name: Nelsón

texts.es:
Nelson is single and 26 years old. He lives in the downtown area of the city of Caaguazú, and he is the owner of a barber shop called "Peluquería Emmanuel". He started his own business 5 years ago and it is going very well. He has a good clientèle, and his shop is in a very busy commercial district. He studied to become a barber for a year in the country's capital, Asunción, and then came back to Caaguazú to exercise his profession.

A few months ago, he started selling cellphones, which generate some good extra income. He considers himself a good salesman, and the demand for cellphones has risen substantially. He only had a few phones in stock to try out the market for them, but now he needs to buy a larger quantity because the demand has increased substantially.

Nelson is requesting a loan of $200 to buy a larger quantity of cellphones. He commits to repay this amount monthly and on time.

Translated by Ramón F. Kolb, Kiva Volunteer

Original loan description in Spanish:

Nelson es soltero y tiene 26 años de edad, se encuentra viviendo en el centro mismo de la ciudad de Caaguazú, y es propietario de una peluquería llamada “Peluquería Emmanuel”. El monto su propio negocio hace 5 años, y le va bastante bien, posee una buena clientela, pues se encuentra en una zona comercial y de bastante movimiento. El estudio peluquería en la ciudad capital, Asunción, durante un año; luego volvió a Caaguazú para ejercer su profesión.

Hace unos meses empezó a vender celulares, que le generan un buen ingreso extra, él se considera buen comerciante, y la demanda de sus teléfonos ha aumentado bastante. Como el solo contaba con poco stock de teléfonos, pues solo compró unos cuantos para hacer una prueba de aceptación, el necesita adquirir ahora en mayor cantidad, ya que la demanda ha aumentado significativamente.

Nelson solicita un crédito de $ 200 para comprar mayor cantidad de teléfonos celulares, y se compromete a devolverlos mensual y puntualmente.

loans.use: to buy cellphones

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en:
Nelson S. P. is 34 years old, married, and has 2 sons: one is 8 years old and goes to primary school, and the other is 2 years old.

Nelson has a micro-enterprise located in his home, a car repair shop. He learned the trade while working as a mechanic in a repair shop in the city, and little by little, he specialized and saved some money to buy materials and start his own shop.

Nowadays, he works with his brother, and they have a lot of work. Because he didn't own the house where he lived and where his workshop is, he decided to buy it and has been paying for it. In order to pay it off completely, he needs a loan of $600 with which he will finish the purchase.

Translated by Ramón F. Kolb, Kiva Volunteer.

Original loan description in Spanish:

Nelson S. P. tiene 34 años de edad está casado y tiene dos hijos varones, uno de 8 años que ya va a la escuela primaria y otro de 2 años.

Nelson tiene una microempresa ubicada en su casa, es dueño de un taller mecánico para autos. Aprendió el oficio trabajando varios años como ayudante en un taller de la ciudad, de a poco fue especializándose y junto unos ahorros con los que pudo comprar materiales y montar su taller.

Hoy día trabaja con su hermano y tienen bastante trabajo; como la casa en la que viven y que en donde también se encuentra el taller, no es propio, el ha decidido comprar la casa y la está pagando actualmente. Para completar su pago necesita un préstamo de $ 600 con lo que cancelará la compra.

loans.use: To pay off the purchase of his home and workshop

loans.name: Perseveranda

texts.en:
Perseveranda is 69 years old, married, and mother of 6 children. Three of them live with her, and 3 already have families of their own. One of the children that live with her works in a service station, and the other two help their mother selling. Her husband works in a sawmill nearby.

Perseveranda is an active and entrepreneurial woman. To maintain her family and help her husband, she has an ice cream stand, makes and sells cakes from her home, and breeds chickens, ducks, and geese to sell them. She learned how to breed and slaughter poultry when she was young since her mother did the same. Nowadays, this activity allows her to sustain herself and generates the best income.

Because the increase of demand for her poultry, she wants to buy more animals. For this, she needs a loan of $300, which she commits to repay punctually.

Translated by Ramón F. Kolb, Kiva Volunteer

Original loan description in Spanish:

Perseveranda tiene 69 años, es casada y es madre D. 6 hijos, D. los cuales, 3 viven con ella y los otros 3 ya tienen formada su familia. Uno D. sus hijos que vive con ella trabaja en una estación D. servicio y los otros dos ayudan a su madre con las ventas; su marido trabaja en un aserradero D. la zona.

Perseveranda es una mujer activa y emprendedora, para mantener a su familia y ayudar a su marido, ella tiene un puesto D. venta D. helados, hace tortas caseras para vender y también cría gallinas, patos y gansos para vender. Ella aprendió desD. muy pequeña como criar las aves y como faenarlas pues su madre se dedicaba a lo mismo. Hoy día esta actividad le sirve D. sustento y es la que mayores ingresos le genera.

Como la demanda D. sus aves va en aumento, ella desea comprar más aves, para ello necesita un préstamo D. $300, que se compromete a devolverlos puntualmente.

loans.use: To buy chickens, ducks, and geese

loans.name: Long

texts.en: Mrs. Long P. is a 54 year-old widow and mother of five children in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. She sells roast beef along the road side in her community where she generates around $6/day in revenue. Two of her children work as security guards, and their salaries provide income for the family.  The rest of her children are married and live with their own families. In order to maximize her income and to meet her clients' needs, Long P. needs more untensils, beef, and some equipment for her booth.  She is requesting the loan to help her buy these items.

loans.use: Needs more utensils, beef and new some equipment to meet her clients needs.

payments.comment: Mrs. Long Post has been very successful with her food stall. She has repaid her loan early! Thank you for helping her to grow her business and improve the standard of living for her family.

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Mrs. Sok C. is 48 years old and the mother of 6 children.  She lives with her husband (pictured here) in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. She is a housewife, while her husband covers all the family expenses by working as a mechanic (auto repairman), making about $6.50/day. Two of her children also work as mechanics like their father, and the rest are married and live with their own families. 

Mrs. Sok C. has requested the loan to help her family purchase more tools and vehicle supplies to run their garage. They are grateful for your help and appreciate your trust and support.

loans.use: Needs tools and vehicle supplies for her husband's garage business.

loans.name: Hang

texts.en: Hang Khim is a 46 year-old mother of 1 child.  She lives with her husband (pictured here) in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. She is a vendor at a market, while her husband works as a dentist. Together, they make on average $13/day. Her husband needs more dental tools for use in his dental surgery, but faces financial constraints.  She has applied for this loan of $1000 to help him grow his business.

loans.use: Needs more dental tools for use in her husband's surgery.

payments.comment:
Congratulations! Hang Sokhim has fully repaid this Kiva loan early.

Thank you for your support of Cambodian entrepreneurs. Lenders like you allow entrepreneurs around the world access to low-interest loans to finance their small businesses and support their families.

We hope you will continue your support by reinvesting in another Kiva entrepreneur.

Sincerely,
Isadora Tang, Kiva Fellow, Cambodia

loans.name: Va

texts.en:
Mrs. Va S., is 46 years old and single.  She lives with her mother in a part of Phnom Penh, Cambodia. To supplement all the family’s expenses, Va S. has two sources of income. First, she runs a small grocery stand at home and second, she works as a baby-sitter looking after her neighbor’s kids. Together, she can typically make around $5 each day. 
Currently, Va S. needs to increase her inventory by adding more products to meet her clients’ needs, which is why she is asking for the loan to assist her. Thank you for your trust and support.

loans.use: Needs to increase her inventory by adding more grocery products.

payments.comment: Van Sinath has successfully repaid her loan early! Thanks to you, she was able to expand her business and improve the life of her family. Thank you for your support!

loans.name: Soy

texts.en: Mrs. Soy N. is 27 years old and lives with her husband and 1 child in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. She and her husband operate a tailoring business and make around $5.50 each day. They think that breeding cows would make a good profit for their family, but they face financial constraints and are requesting for the loan to help them purchase their first cows. She and her family are grateful and appreciate any support you can give.

loans.use: Needs cows to raise.

payments.comment:
Congratulations! Soy Navy has fully repaid this Kiva loan early.

Thank you for your support of Cambodian entrepreneurs. Lenders like you allow entrepreneurs around the world access to low-interest loans to finance their small businesses and support their families.

We hope you will continue your support by reinvesting in another Kiva entrepreneur.

Sincerely,
Isadora Tang, Kiva Fellow, Cambodia

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand her shoes and material selling business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand her clothes business

loans.name: Kim

texts.en:
Mrs. Kim M. is 49 years old and lives her husband and her 2 children in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. She and her husband make a living by selling second-hand clothes at the open air market, where they usually earn approximately $8/day in revenue. One of her children is a teacher of English at a private school, while the other is a secondary school student.

Kim M. would like to add new fashionable clothes to her inventory, but she faces a financial constraint, which is why she is requesting a loan to help her satisfy the great demand of her clients.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to meet her clients' needs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand her food selling business

loans.name: Sam

texts.en:
Mrs. Sam T. is 48 years old and is a vendor at an open air market selling handkerchiefs and different kinds of towels. She can typically make up to $9 each day in revenue, while her husband works as a construction foreman and makes about $4/day. T. has four school-aged children who put big pressure on her family’s expense.

Currently, this couple needs a motorcycle to help transport her products faster and easier. She believes this motorcycle is a potential help for her business. She and her family feel grateful and appreciate your kind support.

loans.use: Needs a motorcycle to help her transport her products.

payments.comment: Congrats! Your Kiva loan has been repaid early. Thank you for taking a sincere interest in helping Cambodian entrepreneurs like Sam Tevy start and sustain their businesses. Your willingness to share your financial resources has made a difference. We hope you continue to lend through CREDIT in the future. Sincerely, Joshua Benadum, CREDIT Intern, Phnom Penh Office.

loans.use: Abigael would like to purchase two steers.

loans.use: Ann Parsitau would like to purchase two steers.

loans.use: Eunice Daniel would like to purchase two steers.

loans.use: Jane Kisai would like to purchase two steers.

loans.use: Beatrice Kimiti would like to purchase two steers.

loans.name: Himayat

texts.en:
This very kind and hardworking man is 40, married, and has 3 children. He lives with his family in Salyan region, Khaladj village.

He has his own orchard. Himayat started his business 14 years ago. He plans to buy fertilizer in order to improve his business and therefore he is applying for a loan of $725.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Hellen would like to buy 2 steers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Ann would like to buy 2 steers

loans.name: Anonymous
